Title: All Souls
Plot: Scully faces her Catholic faith and the loss of her daughter Emily when she is asked to help a family whose adopted daughter was found dead in a position that looked like she was struck down by God himself.
GuestStars: Arnie Walters, Glenn Morshower, Jody Racicot, Emily Perkins, Lauren Diewold, Eric Keenleyside, Patti Allan, Lorraine Landry, Tracy Elofson, Bob Wilde, Tim O'Halloran, Joseph Patrick Finn
